comments.body: I'm not clear what the change is... is it indentation? then I agree. Where else do we have the same issue?

The original log loses the error message, in this example, it's the line 'java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to finish the task'

And it loses suppressed and cause of the exception too, in this case, it's the lines 
'Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: File is not found
at com.xxx.Test.test(Test.java:105)
...'
